```{r #1}
df = read.csv("top100retailers2015.csv")
```

```{r, #2}
str(df)
summary(df)
```

```{r, #3}
x <- "[$|,|%]"
for( i in colnames(df[5:10])){
  df[[i]] <- gsub(x, "", df[[i]])
  df[[i]] <- as.numeric(df[[i]])
}
```

```{r, #4}
df <- separate(df, col = Headquarter, into = c("City", "State"), sep = ", ", remove = TRUE, convert = FALSE)
```

```{r, #5}
df <- df[2:ncol(df)]
for(i in 5:ncol(df)){
  print(summary(df[i]))
}
```

```{r, #6}
df <- df[order(df$RetailSales2014, decreasing = TRUE),]
head(df)
```
